languages.text: "Лишь глупцы и безумцы всегда уверены в своих силах. Мудрые же полны сомнений, но умеют их отпускать".
"Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."
languages.original_text: "Лишь глупцы и безумцы всегда уверены в своих силах. Мудрые же полны сомнений, но умеют их отпускать".

traits.locale_text: "Only the mad and the foolish don't ever doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubts, but they know how to let go of them."
"Only the mad and the foolish don't ever doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubts, but they know how to let go of them."
"Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."
"Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."
"Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

languages.text: “只有疯子和傻子才会永远自信。智者多疑，但他们知道如何放下疑虑。”
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: “只有疯子和傻子才会永远自信。智者多疑，但他们知道如何放下疑虑。”

languages.text: «Los locos y los necios son los únicos que nunca dudan de su fuerza. El sabio se ve asaltado por la duda constantemente, pero sabe cómo sobreponerse a ella».
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: «Los locos y los necios son los únicos que nunca dudan de su fuerza. El sabio se ve asaltado por la duda constantemente, pero sabe cómo sobreponerse a ella».

languages.text: « Il n'y a que les fous et les imbéciles qui ne doutent jamais de leur force. Les sages sont pleins de doutes, mais savent comment les dissiper. »
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a que les fous et les imbéciles qui ne doutent jamais de leur force. Les sages sont pleins de doutes, mais savent comment les dissiper. »

languages.text: "Nur Wahnsinnige und Dummköpfe zweifeln niemals an ihrer Kraft. Die Klugen sind voller Zweifel, aber sie wissen auch, wie man sie überwindet."
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Wahnsinnige und Dummköpfe zweifeln niemals an ihrer Kraft. Die Klugen sind voller Zweifel, aber sie wissen auch, wie man sie überwindet."

languages.text: 「自分の力に疑念を抱かないのは、狂人と愚か者だけだ。賢者は疑念に満ちているが、それを手放す術を知っている」
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の力に疑念を抱かないのは、狂人と愚か者だけだ。賢者は疑念に満ちているが、それを手放す術を知っている」

languages.text: "Yalnızca deliler ve aptallar, kuvvetlerinden şüphe duymaz. Bilge olanlar ise şüpheyle doludur ama şüphelerinden nasıl kurtulacaklarını bilirler."
languages.original_text: "Only the mad and the foolish never doubt their strength. The wise are full of doubt, but they know how to let go of them."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca deliler ve aptallar kuvvetlerinden şüphe duymazlar. Bilge olanlar şüpheyle doludur ama şüphelerinden nasıl kurtulacaklarını bilirler."
